sword.description: [Basic Attack]:Deals [Damage Rate: 130%] Physical Damage to enemy target. Can cast [Sword Slash] every 6s. Charges toward an enemy target to deal [Damage Rate: 180%] Physical Damage and inflict 40% Slow for 2s.

[Basic Attack]:Deals [Damage Rate: 130%] Physical Damage to enemy target. Can cast [Sword Cleave] every 5. Deals [Damage Rate: 220%] Physical Damage to surrounding enemies. Grants [Target-based Max HP 3%] Shield for each enemy hit, lasting 4s. Stacks up to 5 times.

[Basic Attack]:Deals [Damage Rate: 130%] Physical Damage to enemy target. Can cast [Sword Energy] every 6s. Unleashes sword energy forward, dealing [Damage Rate: 140%] Physical Damage to enemies hit. Increases Movement Speed by 25% for 2s if at least 1 enemy is hit.

Performs 4 forward slashes, each dealing [Damage Rate: 60%] Physical Damage to players ([Damage Rate: 90%] Physical Damage to mobs). The final hit unleashes sword energy forward, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage to all enemies hit.

Leaps to the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage and inflicting 50% Slow for 3s to nearby enemies upon landing. Gains [Target-based Max HP 20%] Shield for 4s when hitting at least 1 enemy

Hold to charge with control immunity and gain +20% Damage Resistance. While charging: Deals [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and Stuns enemies for 0.5s. After charging for 1.5s, deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage, Stuns fpr 1.5s and creates a ground wave that deals [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and inflicts 40% Slow for 4s.

Begins Blocking for 3s. While Blocking, reduces Movement Speed but gains control immunity and +70% Damage Resistance. Afterward, deals [Damage Rate: 320%] Physical Damage to nearby enemies and reduces their Armor by 20% for 4s. Block can be canceled early

Immediately removes all control effects, gains 1 stack of [Sword Momentum], increases Damage Resistance by 25%, and the Attack Speed of the next 3 Basic Attacks by 80% for 8s. Can be used while skills are disabled.

Spins toward the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: 75%] Physical Damage to all players ([Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage to mobs) hit. At 3+ Sword Momentum stacks, creates a tornado on arrival, dealing [Damage Rate: 50%] Physical Damage every 1s for 5s.

X Aura and Blade Passive [Momentum]: Gains 1 stack of [Momentum] every second while in combat and 2 stacks when dealing damage with Basic Attacks, 4 stacks on Critical Hit, 1 stack when taking Basic Attack Damage, and 2 stacks when taking Skill Damage. At 10 [Momentum] stacks, increases Sword Momentum by 1 level. Momentum lasts 20s. [Sword Momentum]: Each level grants +3% Damage, +4% Attack Speed, and +4% Damage Resistance. Lasts 8s. Grants up to 6 stacks, decaying over time.

sword.changes:
- Healing Reduction Duration: 3s -> 4s
- Stun Duration: 1s -> 1.5s
- Explosion Damage Rate: 150% -> 200%
sword.description: Briefly charges up and then rushes at the target enemy, inflicting [Heal Block] for 4s and dealing Physical Damage based on [Sword Momentum] stacks. [Sword Momentum] stacks: 0 | 1 | 2 | 3-6 Physical Damage: [Damage Rate: 210%] | [Damage Rate: 240%] | [Damage Rate: 270%] | [Damage Rate: 300%] At 3+ stacks, creates an explosion dealing [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage and Stunning for 1.5s. [Heal Block]: Cannot receive healing.

sword.changes:
- Silence Duration at 2 Stacks: 1s -> 2s
- Silence Duration at 3+ Stacks: 2s -> 4s
sword.description: Unleashes a powerful sword energy toward the target direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 300%] Magic Damage to enemies hit. Additional effects based on [Sword Momentum] stacks: 1 stack: 30% Slow for 2s. 2 stacks: 30% Slow for 2s and Silence for 2s. 3-6 stacks: 30% Slow for 4s and Silence for 4s. At 3+ stacks, unleashes 2 extra Sword Energy. Additional Sword Energy deals 30% reduced damage.

sword.changes:
- Damage Output Reduction Duration: 4s -> 6s
- Stun Duration: 1.5s -> 2s
sword.description: Knocks enemies back 8m and deals [Damage Rate: 450%] Physical Damage. Reduces Damage dealt based on [Sword Momentum] stacks for 6s. Sword Momentum] Stacks: 0 | 1 | 2 | 3-6 Reduction to damage dealt: 20% | 26% | 32% | 38% At 3+ stacks, Knockback increased to 12m and Stuns for 2s on collision.

Gains immunity to Forced Movement (Pull, Knockback). Attack range and Max HP increase based on [Sword Momentum] stacks for 10s (Cannot be dispelled) Can use [Titan's Stride] to deal [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and Knockup enemies for 0.5s. [Sword Momentum] Stacks: 0 | 1 | 2 | 3-6 Basic Attack range: 1.5 | 2 | 2.5 | 3 Max HP: 30% |45% | 60% | 75% At 3+ stacks, creates a titan aura that Slows enemies by 30% and reduces Attack Speed by 30%.

sword.changes:
- Sword Energy Damage Rate: 300% -> 250%
- Each Slash Damage Rate: 40% -> 30%
- Damage Resistance Reduction Duration: 6s -> 4s
- Cooldown: 25s -> 30s
- Movement Method: Fixed 16m Displacement -> Selectable 6-16m Displacement
sword.description: Dashes forward, dealing [Damage Rate: 250%] Physical Damage to all enemies hit. Reduces Damage Resistance based on [Sword Momentum] stacks for 4s. [Sword Momentum] stacks: 0 | 1 | 2 | 3-6 Damage Resistance reduction: 15% | 24% | 32% | 40% At 3+ stacks, Pulls enemies to the center on arrival and slashes multiple times over 1.8s, dealing [Damage Rate: 30%] Physical Damage every 0.3s.

Leaps to the target location, creating countless blades. Physical Damage scales with [Sword Momentum] stacks. [Sword Momentum] Stacks: 0 | 1 | 2 | 3-6 Physical Damage: [Damage Rate: 280%] | [Damage Rate: 320%] | [Damage Rate: 360%] | [Damage Rate: 400%] At 3+ stacks, creates two sets of blades forming outward, each dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and inflicting 1s Knockup.
